clinical_study.brief_title: Iloprost Therapy in Patients With Critical Limb Ischemia
clinical_study.official_title: Iloprost Therapy in Patients With Critical Limb Ischemia: Evaluation of Efficacy and Safety

brief_summary.textblock: Monitoring efficacy and safety aspects of iv. iloprost therapy of patients with critical limb ischemia by recording clinical parameters.

primary_outcome.measure: Change of limb pain at rest assessed by visual analogue scale
primary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline, at the end of iloprost treatment, at follow-up visits ( month 3, 6, 12)
primary_outcome.description: Pain relief will be defined as complete relief of pain while off analgesics

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at baseline, at the end of iloprost treatment and at follow-up visits ( month 3, 6, 12)

secondary_outcome.measure: Collection of interventional / surgical procedures including 1) Rate of revascularization procedures; 2) Minor amputations; 3) Frequency and height of major amputations
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at baseline, at the end of iloprost treatment and at follow-up visits ( month 3, 6, 12)

secondary_outcome.measure: Mortality and/or severe cardiovascular events (AMI, stroke)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at baseline, at the end of iloprost treatment and at follow-up visits ( month 3, 6, 12)

secondary_outcome.measure: Hemodynamic measurements: peripheral arterial blood flow and pressure on ankle / hallux level by Doppler scanner
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at baseline, at the end of iloprost treatment and at follow-up visits ( month 3, 6, 12)

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes of transcutaneously measured tissue oxygen tension values
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at baseline, at the end of iloprost treatment and at follow-up visits ( month 3, 6, 12)

intervention.description: Prescription and treatment of Iloprost will be decided by physicians

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients who fulfill the internationally defined criteria of critical limb ischemia;
- Patients who are not eligible for vascular surgery or angioplasty interventions and
- Patients who are treated with iloprost infusion.
- The treating physician has decided iloprost treatment before study enrollment.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Exclusion criteria are in accordance with the Summary of Product Characteristics of Ilomedin.
